Activity: Arrive at the office. Check emails and calendar for urgent matters. Prioritize tasks based on urgency and impact.
Final review of submitted SMART goals. Prepare for individual meetings with team leads.
Individual meeting with @larch-1 to discuss and refine SMART goals for the software development team. Focus on architecture, scalability, and security.
Individual meeting with @qres-1 to discuss and refine SMART goals for the quantitative research team. Focus on model development, backtesting, and risk analysis.
Individual meeting with @dsde-1 to discuss and refine SMART goals for the data science team. Focus on data acquisition, cleaning, and feature engineering.
Individual meeting with @comp-1 to discuss and refine SMART goals for the compliance team. Focus on regulatory adherence, risk mitigation, and audit preparation.
Individual meeting with @ir-1 to discuss and refine SMART goals for the investor relations team. Focus on investor communication, fundraising strategy, and UHNWI targeting.
Individual meeting with @onbd-1 to discuss and refine SMART goals for the client onboarding team. Focus on KYC/AML compliance, client documentation, and account setup.
Lunch. Discuss the latest advancements in machine learning with @dsde-1 and @dsde-2.
Meeting with @legal-1 and @comp-1 to discuss SEC regulations and compliance requirements for fund registration. Review documentation checklist and address any outstanding questions.
Update the project plan with the refined SMART goals from each team, incorporating any adjustments made during individual meetings.
Send a revised project plan, including finalized SMART goals, to COO and CIO for final approval.
Prepare a presentation summarizing key milestones for the week, potential risks, and mitigation strategies for discussion during the weekly project status meeting.
Finalize daily tasks and prepare for tomorrow's schedule.
